Classes in esg.saml.authz.service.api used by esg.saml.authz.service.api
SAMLAuthorization
          Interface representing the authorization decision of performing the requested actions on the given resource.

          Interface representing the authorization decision of performing the requested actions on the given resource.

          Factory to generate a SAMLAuthorizations object for a given system user, resource and actions.

SAMLAuthorizationServiceClient
          Client-side API for interacting with a SAMLAuthorizationService.
